loop do
    t, sheet = gets.chomp.split
    target = t.to_i
    break if target == 0

    hash = {}
    (0 .. 2 ** (sheet.size - 1) - 1).each do |x| 
        arr = [-1] + (0..sheet.size-1).select {|i| x[i] == 1} + [sheet.size-1]

        part = arr.each_cons(2).map {|i, j| sheet[i+1..j]}
        # next if part.any?{|s| s =~ /^0./}
        sum = part.map(&:to_i).inject(:+)
        (hash[sum] ||= []) << part
    end 

    hash.delete_if {|s, _| s > target}

    if hash.empty?
        puts 'error'
    else
        max = hash.keys.max

        if hash[max].size > 1 
            puts 'rejected'
        else
            puts ([max] + hash[max][0]) * ' ' 
        end 
    end 
end

def input
  line = STDIN.gets and line.split.map &:to_i
end

Problem = Struct.new(:target, :num) do
  def self.read
    t, num = input
    return nil if !t || t == 0
    new t, num
  end
  
  def solve
    chars = num.to_s
    max = -1
    lesser = -1
    max_digits = nil
    
    (1 << (chars.size - 1)).times do |n|
      digits = splits_at(chars, n)
      sum = digits.inject(:+)
      if sum <= target && max <= sum
        max, lesser = sum, max
        max_digits = digits
      end
    end
    
    if max < 0
      puts :error
    elsif max == lesser
      puts :rejected
    else
      puts [max, *max_digits].join(' ')
    end
  end
  
  def splits_at(str, n)
    i = 0
    chunks = []
    (str.size - 1).times do |j|
      n, m = n.divmod(2)
      next if m == 0
      chunks << str[i..j].to_i
      i = j + 1
    end
    chunks << str[i..-1].to_i
  end
end

while problem = Problem.read
  problem.solve
end

loop do
    t, num = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
    break if t == 0 && num == 0
    d = num.to_s.length - 1
    num = num.to_s
    max = -1
    maxp = []
    (1 << d).times do |bit|
        cur = 1 << (d - 1)
        cur_s = 0
        sum = 0
        parts = Array.new
        d.times do |i|
            if bit & cur != 0
                sum += num[cur_s..i].to_i
                parts.push(num[cur_s..i].to_i)
                cur_s = i + 1
            end
            cur = cur >> 1
        end
        parts.push(num[(cur_s)...num.length].to_i)
        sum += num[(cur_s)...num.length].to_i
        if sum > max && sum <= t
            max = sum
            maxp = parts
        elsif sum == max
            max = Float::INFINITY
        end
    end
    puts max == -1 ? "error" : (max == Float::INFINITY ? "rejected" : "#{max} #{maxp * " "}")
end

loop do
    t, num = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
    break if t == 0 && num == 0
    d = num.to_s.length - 1
    num = num.to_s
    max = -1
    maxp = []
    twice = false
    (1 << d).times do |bit|
        cur = 1 << (d - 1)
        cur_s = 0
        sum = 0
        parts = Array.new
        d.times do |i|
            if bit & cur != 0
                sum += num[cur_s..i].to_i
                parts.push(num[cur_s..i].to_i)
                cur_s = i + 1
            end
            cur = cur >> 1
        end
        parts.push(num[(cur_s)...num.length].to_i)
        sum += num[(cur_s)...num.length].to_i
        if sum > max && sum <= t
            max = sum
            maxp = parts
            twice = false
        elsif sum == max
            twice = true
        end
    end
    puts max == -1 ? "error" : (twice ? "rejected" : "#{max} #{maxp * " "}")
end

def shred str, pattern
    arr, add = [], ""
    pattern.length.times{|i|
        add += str[i]
        if pattern[i] == "1"
            arr << add
            add = ""
        end
    }
    add += str[-1] if str.length > 1
    arr << add
    arr
end

while true
    target, paper = gets.chomp.split
    break if [target, paper] == ["0", "0"]

    target = target.to_i
    max = Hash.new{|h, k| h[k] = []}
    (2 ** (paper.length - 1)).times{|i|
        pattern = sprintf("%0#{paper.length - 1}b", i)
        numbers = shred(paper, pattern)
        sum = numbers.map(&:to_i).inject(:+)
        max[sum] << numbers if sum <= target
    }
    first = max.to_a.sort_by!{|k, v| -k}[0]
    answer = nil
    if first.nil?
        answer = "error"
    elsif first[1].length > 1
        answer = "rejected"
    else
        answer = "#{first[0]} " + first[1].join(" ")
    end
    puts answer
end

loop do
  t, num = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
  break if (t || num) == 0

  nums = num.to_s.split('').map(&:to_i)
  blen = nums.length - 1

  max_sum = nil
  max_nums = nil

  for bits in (0...(1 << blen))
    b = bits
    sum = 0
    mnums = []
    prv = nums[0]

    for i in (1..blen)
      if (b & 1) == 0
        prv = prv * 10 + nums[i]
      else
        sum += prv
        mnums << prv
        prv = nums[i]
      end
      b >>= 1
    end
    sum += prv
    mnums << prv
    #p [sum, mnums]

    if sum <= t
      if max_sum.nil? || max_sum < sum
        max_sum = sum
        max_nums = mnums
      elsif max_sum == sum
        max_nums = nil
      end
    end
  end

  if max_sum.nil?
    puts 'error'
  elsif max_nums.nil?
    puts 'rejected'
    #puts max_sum
  else
    puts ([max_sum] + max_nums).join(' ')
  end
end

import itertools
while 1:
    t,s = map(int,raw_input().split())
    if t == 0: break
    ans = s if s < t else 0
    s = str(s)
    nums = [s] if ans > 0 else []
    n = len(s)
    reject = False
    for split in xrange(1,n):
        for cuts in itertools.combinations(range(1,n),split):
            cuts = [0]+list(cuts)+[n]
            tmp = sum(int(s[i:j]) for i,j in zip(cuts,cuts[1:]))
            if   tmp == ans: reject = True
            elif t >= tmp and tmp > ans:
                ans = tmp
                nums = [s[i:j] for i,j in zip(cuts,cuts[1:])]
                reject = False
    if reject:
        print "rejected"
    else:
        print "error" if len(nums) == 0 else ans," ".join(nums)

        for cuts in itertools.combinations(range(1,n),split):
            cuts = [0]+list(cuts)+[n]
            tmp = sum(int(s[i:j]) for i,j in zip(cuts,cuts[1:]))
            if   tmp == ans: reject = True
            elif t >= tmp > ans:
                ans = tmp
                nums = [s[i:j] for i,j in zip(cuts,cuts[1:])]
                reject = False
    if reject: print "rejected"
    elif len(nums) == 0: print "error"
    else: print ans, " ".join(nums)

#!usr/bin/env python3
from collections import defaultdict,deque
from heapq import heappush, heappop
import sys
import math
import bisect
import random
def LI(): return [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split()]
def I(): return int(sys.stdin.readline())
def LS():return [list(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split()]
def S(): return list(sys.stdin.readline())[:-1]
def IR(n):
    return [I() for i in range(n)]
def LIR(n):
    return [LI() for i in range(n)]
def SR(n):
    return [S() for i in range(n)]
def LSR(n):
    return [LS() for i in range(n)]

sys.setrecursionlimit(1000000)
mod = 1000000007

def solve(t,n):
    if t == n:
        print(t,n)
        return
    a = list(map(int,list(str(n))))
    s = sum(a)
    m = len(a)
    if s > t:
        print("error")
        return
    nm = m-1
    f = [0]*nm
    d = defaultdict(lambda : 0)
    d[tuple(f)] = 1
    l = [[] for i in range(t+1)]
    q = [(s,f)]
    l[s].append(f)
    ans = s
    while q:
        s,f = heappop(q)
        for i in range(nm):
            if f[i]:
                continue
            nf = [1 if j == i else f[j] for j in range(nm)]
            ns = 0
            ms = a[0]
            for j in range(1,m):
                if nf[j-1]:
                    ms *= 10
                    ms += a[j]
                else:
                    ns += ms
                    ms = a[j]
            ns += ms
            if ns <= t:
                tf = tuple(nf)
                if not d[tf]:
                    d[tf] = 1
                    if ns >= ans:
                        ans = ns
                        l[ns].append(nf)
                    heappush(q,(ns,nf))
    if len(l[ans]) > 1:
        print("rejected")
        return
    s = [ans]
    f = l[ans][0]
    k = a[0]
    for i in range(nm):
        if f[i]:
            k *= 10
            k += a[i+1]
        else:
            s.append(k)
            k = a[i+1]
    s.append(k)
    print(*s)
    return

#Solve
if __name__ == "__main__":
    while 1:
        t,n = LI()
        if t == n == 0:
            break
        solve(t,n)

import itertools
from heapq import heappop, heappush
from collections import defaultdict
def main(t, num):
    num = list(str(num))
    d = defaultdict(int)
    if t < sum(map(int, num)):
        print("error")
        return
    q = [[0,[]]]
    itertools.product()
    fulls = itertools.product(range(2), repeat=len(num) - 1)
    for full in fulls:
        tmp = 0
        res = []
        b = 0
        f = False
        for i in range(len(num) - 1):
            if full[i]:
                res.append(i)
                tmp += int("".join(num[b: i + 1]))
                b = i + 1
        tmp += int("".join(num[b:]))
        a, b = heappop(q)
        a *= - 1
        if a == tmp: d[a] += 1
        if t >= tmp > a:
            a = tmp
            b = res
        heappush(q, [-a, b])
    a, b = heappop(q)
    a *= - 1
    if d[a] or a == 0:
        print("rejected")
    else:
        ans = []
        be = 0
        for i in b:
            ans.append(int("".join(num[be: i + 1])))
            be = i + 1
        ans.append(int("".join(num[be:])))
        print(a,*ans)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    while 1:
        t, num = map(int, input().split())
        if t == num == 0:
            break
        main(t, num)

import itertools
while 1:
    t,s = map(int,raw_input().split())
    if t == 0: break
    ans = s if s < t else 0
    s = str(s)
    nums = [s] if ans > 0 else []
    n = len(s)
    reject = False
    for split in xrange(1,n):
        for cuts in itertools.combinations(range(1,n),split):
            cuts = [0]+list(cuts)+[n]
            tmp = sum(int(s[i:j]) for i,j in zip(cuts,cuts[1:]))
            if   tmp == ans: reject = True
            elif t >= tmp and tmp > ans:
                ans = tmp
                nums = [s[i:j] for i,j in zip(cuts,cuts[1:])]
                reject = False
    if reject:
        print "rejected"
    else:
        print ans," ".join(nums) if len(nums) > 0 else "error"

            if   tmp == ans: reject = True

                ans = tmp

                reject = False
    if reject:
        print "rejected"
    else:
        print "error" if len(nums) == 0 else ans," ".join(nums)

    n = len(s)
    reject = False
    for split in xrange(1,n):

            cuts = [0]+list(cuts)+[n]
            tmp = sum(int(s[i:j]) for i,j in zip(cuts,cuts[1:]))
            if   tmp == ans: reject = True

                ans = tmp
                nums = [s[i:j] for i,j in zip(cuts,cuts[1:])]

    if reject:
        print "rejected"
    else:
        print "error" if len(nums) == 0 else ans," ".join(nums)
